exceptions.exn: In environment E : Rbar -> Prop l : Rbar H : Rbar_is_lub E l Unable to unify "l" with "Rbar_lub E".
The reference CVU_dom was not found in the current environment.
The reference H was not found in the current environment.
The reference H was not found in the current environment.

original: split. - intros H eps. unfold CVU_dom in H. specialize (H eps). unfold eventually in H. destruct H as [N HN]. exists N. intros n m x Dx Hn Hm. specialize (HN m). assert (Hm' : (N <= m)%nat) by auto. apply HN in Dx as HM. specialize (HN n). assert (Hn' : (N <= n)%nat) by auto. apply HM in Hn as HNm. apply Rabs_def2 in HNm as [H1 H2]. specialize (HN m Dx). apply Rabs_def2 in HN as [H3 H4]. lra. - intros HC eps. unfold CVU_cauchy in HC. specialize (HC eps). destruct HC as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Dx. specialize (HN n n Dx (le_n N) (le_n N)). unfold Lim_seq. unfold Lim_seq in HN. auto.
